creator.compiler
Class XmlParseErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--creator.compiler.XmlParseErrorHandler
public class XmlParseErrorHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

Parse Error Handler. It will log and present errors and warnings for a compilation. It is also the error handler for the XML parser. WARNING!!! An instance of this must be registered with the parser before EACH compile.

See Also:
Sim
